Home

Hello!

This is the website and blog of Andrew K. Hirsch. The blog posts here are my little contributions to the computer science culture of the internet. I post about projects that I'm working on, ideas that I'm playing with, and cool things I've found.

I also post reports on my professional trips, an idea I got from Edsgar Dijkstra. You can also find my reports on my research projects. The recent posts, and reports are listed below.

  • On Pony - June 15, 2013
  • Parsing Without Tying the Recursive Knot - November 19, 2012
  • Diving Into the Parser Monad - November 19, 2012
  • Fully Functional Extensible Parsers - November 8, 2012
